partintro.para: InterBase is a popular database put out by Borland/Inprise. More information about InterBase is available at &url.ibase. Oh, by the way, Interbase just joined the open source movement!

refsect1.simpara: Performs a query on a InterBase database, returning a result identifier for use with ibase_fetch_row, ibase_free_result and ibase_free_query.
